acme.util.option

Class CommandLineOption<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • acme.util.option.Option<T>
      • acme.util.option.CommandLineOption<T>

  • public abstract class CommandLineOption<T>
extends Option<T>
    An option configurable on the command line.
